summary: A documentary that follows Dan Harmon on tour for his podcast series after he was fired from Community in 2012.
cast: Dan Harmon|Jeff Bryan Davis|Erin McGathy|Spencer Crittenden|Steve Agee|Jack Black|Matt Braunger|Alison Brie|Yvette Nicole Brown|Diane Crittenden|Abed Gheith|Donald Glover|Chris Hardwick|Gillian Jacobs|Ken Jeong|Brandon Johnson|Jay Johnston|Joel McHale|John Oliver|Danny Pudi|Jim Rash|Justin Roiland|Rob Schrab|Sarah Silverman|Ben Stiller|Jason Sudeikis|Chris Tallman|Jen Brown|Talitha Hanks|Patton Oswalt|Andy Young|Richard Ayoade|Chevy Chase|Jessica Johnson|Charley Koontz|Brie Larson|Marc Maron|Annamaria Sofillas
title: Harmontown
